name: 莊澤光
objective:
本課程旨在為互動媒體脈絡提供學生創意思考與企劃故事腳本，使學生瞭解互動媒體實務運作時，最前端的構思與規劃所需要的知識與技能，以及與不同領域專業的溝通表達。本課程包括一系列的腳本企劃、使用者體驗、創意呈現，以及互動媒體企劃實務案例探討。本課程之評量是以分組討論與腳本企劃報告為主。
This course is to provide the creative thinking and story-script with the context of interactive media by which students can understand the practice of interactive media, and learn the knowledge and skill for planning and creation. The contents include a series of script planning, user experience, creative representatives and the case study of interactive media. The assessment of this course depends upon the group discussion and script planning report.
